COMMIT.MESSAGE: System tests: unverbosify a flake log One of our oldest most frustrating flakes is #16091, "Timed out waiting for BYE". In #17489 we added some debug output to see if the problem was a container hang of some sort. It does not seem to be (see #17675), and the debug output makes it hard to read failure logs, so let's remove it. Signed-off-by: Ed Santiago <santiago@redhat.com>
